org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text

Interface Field


  • public interface Field
    Identifiers for fields in a delimited/columnar database.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(String token, EventBuilder builder)
      Apply the field's value to the builder.
      Set<Class<? extends EventBuilder>> getExpectedBuilderTypes()
      Get the set of event builder types that this field can apply to.
      boolean isOptional()
      Query whether this field is optional.

    • Method Detail

      • isOptional

        boolean isOptional()
        Query whether this field is optional.
        Returns:
        true if the field is optional.

      • apply

        void apply(String token,
           EventBuilder builder)
        Apply the field's value to the builder.
        Parameters:
        token - The field value (or null if this is a nonexistent optional field).
        builder - The builder into which to set the value.

      • getExpectedBuilderTypes

        Set<Class<? extends EventBuilder>> getExpectedBuilderTypes()
        Get the set of event builder types that this field can apply to.
        Returns:
        A set of classes representing event builder types to which this field can apply.”
